title: I managed to get blizzard to refund all money i spent on hearthstone
body:
Ggwp. 

I win. All my moolah I spent on adventures is mine again.

Their new changes ruined the game. I am happy to refund :) got my money baaack baaaaaby.

Time to spend it all on RP.

In b4 jealousy down votes.

ADDING HERE: I also refunded overwatch. I disagree with Blizzards nefarious and disgusting business methodologies and so they lost all of my business. I will spend my money here on league of legends where the developers actually care.
